name: Attack of the Killer Robot
description:
This games is created for the VR JAM 2021!

C8B20, you are tasked with destroying the small, puny planet known as earth. Do not leave a building untouched! Destroy it all!

Instruction:

1. Download!

 2. Extract the package!

 3. Open the extracted folder and start the game!

Note: Works only with Oculus headsets.

 HAVE FUN!!!

Creators: Paweł Misztal and Tooth Games
